channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "⚡ Contributing to Ruby ⚡"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "⚡ Contributing to Ruby ⚡"

item.title: Suggestion from the proposer
item.description: @Nikos Alrighty! I wouldn't mind giving a full 30 minute talk on this in any case, so I'll leave the proposal up.

item.title: Suggestion from Nikos Dimitrakopoulos (@)
item.description: FYI we are going to have a separate section for lightning talks after the main lineup/schedule is ready.

item.title: Suggestion from the proposer
item.description: This is meant to be a Lightning talk, I've given a full 45 minute presentation on it before, but I think I can get across all the major talking points in a few minutes.
